page.title: 15FESTIVALS,HAYFIELD.
page.content: In 1977,Hayfield held its first{ {Sheepdog Trials.}Since then,this festival has taken place annually on a weekend in September.Many local organisations take part to raise money.Some of the usual features include archery,assualt courses,motor bikes,competitions and sports. {Hayfield Jazz Festival}takes place annually in June. People attend from all over the country .It's on for a whole weekend,over night as well, and is held in tents,pubs, and car parks.A parade is held through the village. {Hayfield May Queen}is one of the main festivals in Hayfield.The procession parades through the village finishing at the May Queen field where there is a fair.Many people come to see the May Queen and on this Saturday in early May the streets are decorated with ribbons and flags.
